title: Mangal Lakshmi
overview: Mangal Lakshmi is a heartwarming tale that centers around the bond between two sisters, Mangal and Lakshmi. As Mangal navigates through life's experiences, she embarks on a journey to find the perfect dulha for her beloved sister, Lakshmi. Through love, trials, and determination, Mangal's quest unfolds, showcasing the enduring strength of sisterhood and the power of destiny in bringing two souls together.
